evaluators.name: REFLECTION
evaluators.description: Reflects on agent behavior and provides feedback for improvement.

examples.prompt:
Agent Name: Sarah
Agent Role: Community Manager
Room Type: group
Current Room: general-chat
Message Sender: John (user-123)

content.text: Welcome John! How did you find our community?

examples.outcome:
<response>
  <thought>I'm engaging appropriately with a new community member, maintaining a welcoming and professional tone.</thought>
  <quality_score>85</quality_score>
  <strengths>Welcoming tone and helpful follow-up question.</strengths>
  <improvements>Ask a slightly more specific question to learn John's goals.</improvements>
  <learnings>Balance warmth with clarity and next steps.</learnings>
</response>

evaluators.name: RELATIONSHIP_EXTRACTION
evaluators.description: Passively extracts and updates relationship information from conversations.

examples.prompt: User introduces themselves with social media

content.text: Hi, I'm Sarah Chen. You can find me on X @sarahchen_dev

examples.outcome: Extracts X handle and creates/updates the entity with a platform identity.
